AboutMe:
Hi there!

I'm an Australian speaker of English, Italian, and German, and I'm on the path to learning many more languages! My current focuses are:

  • Spanish
  • Italian and German for the best possible score in my high school studies

I love Linguistics and Maths too, however I'm more passionate about the former. I guess you could also say I enjoy computer programming, however again I'm not the biggest enthusiast.
